title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 193.3 - School district supervision of juveniles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 193.3 - School district supervision of juveniles

State Regulations
(a) The board of education or board of
trustees shall designate a school administrator or teacher to supervise the
juvenile. It shall be the duty of such school administrator or teacher to
monitor all working conditions for compliance with the provisions of this Part
and with the terms of the written statement. (b) A written report shall be made at least
every six months to the Family Court and to the appropriate probation
department or agency which submits probation recommendations or reports, unless
the Family Court orders otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
193.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
